alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Franklin County through 545 PM CDT... At 520 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hamburg, or 10 miles northwest of Meadville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kirby around 530 PM CDT. Meadville, Bude and New Hope around 545 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Mississippi.
